r.content: r → float : Gets or sets the red component of the color.

g.content: g → float : Gets or sets the green component of the color.

b.content: b → float : Gets or sets the blue component of the color.

a.content: a → float : Gets or sets the alpha component of the color.

[].content: [index]→ float: Sample values may be accessed from a Color using the [] subscript operator.

copy.content:
copy()→ Color: Returns a new color that is a copy of the color. TouchDesigner Build:
